analysis: Boman C-P-D to AR(2) Eigenvalue Bridge (CORRECTED)

identifiability.k1_k5_product: Identifiable from ω = √(k1·k5) — but k1 and k5 individually are NOT
identifiability.k2: INVISIBLE to linearized eigenvalue analysis — changes equilibrium only
identifiability.k4: Partially detectable via D-observable AR structure (driven filter of C-P oscillation)
identifiability.k3: Affects D-compartment via k3·P forcing term; partially detectable through D-markers

rule_distinguishability.Rules_1_3_5: INDISTINGUISHABLE — all change ω via k1·k5 product
rule_distinguishability.Rule_2: INVISIBLE in linearized model — requires nonlinear analysis
rule_distinguishability.Rule_4: PARTIALLY detectable via D-marker gene AR structure

critical_limitation: Boman key disease driver (k2 decrease) is invisible to linearized AR(2). The framework detects ω changes (k1·k5) but misses the primary pathogenic mechanism.
